'''''Minecraft Education: Frozen Planet II (Original Soundtrack)''''' is the first soundtrack released for ''[[Minecraft]]'' by Adam Lukas and James Everingham, which consists of the songs that were released as part of the ''{{w|Frozen Planet II}}'' DLC. It was released on November 15, 2022.
